name: CSSStyleSheet
description: The CSSStyleSheet interface represents a single CSS stylesheet, and lets you inspect and modify the list of rules contained in the stylesheet.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM)
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSStyleSheet' in the 'CSS Object Model (CSSOM)' specification.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSStyleSheet' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification' specification.
